Alg-ExisAn-Exis1ou-AdExAorEx-SolSE1-1: %# Database File : Alg-ExisAn-Exis1ou-AdExAorEx-SolSE1-1\qt_endl%@ Database source: b_gymnasiou\qt_endl\begin{alist}\qt_endl\item $ 2x-1=4+2x\Rightarrow 2x-2x=4+1\Rightarrow 0x=5 $ αδύνατη\qt_endl\item $ 7-3x=-3x+7\Rightarrow 3x-3x=7-7\Rightarrow 0x=0 $ αόριστη\qt_endl\item $ 5x-3=x-3+4\Rightarrow 5x-x-4x=3-3\Rightarrow 0x=0 $ αόριστη\qt_endl\item $ 2x+1-x=x-3+4\Rightarrow 2x-x-x=-1-3+4\Rightarrow 0x=0 $ αόριστη\qt_endl\end{alist}\qt_endl%# End of file Alg-ExisAn-Exis1ou-AdExAorEx-SolSE1-1
